articles.description: The refrigerator recall includes six models of the GE-brand French Door Refrigerators with bottom freezers in fingerprint resistant stainless steel, which were sold at home improvement and home appliance stores nationwide.
articles.content:
More than 150,000 General Electric refrigerators are being recalled because of a fall hazard, according to the Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC). 
The recall includes six models of the GE-br… [+1598 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 tracker: FDA grants authorization for first coronavirus breathalyzer - FiercePharma
articles.description: The FDA has granted Emergency Use Authorization for the InspectIR COVID-19 breathalyzer, the first of its kind for COVID-19.  | The FDA granted an emergency use authorization for the first COVID-19 diagnostic test that can detect the virus through breath samp…
